bibl.title: Marie Robina Grayson vs. Henry M. White. Criminal.
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: Western District Court of Washington, Northern Division.

div1.p: UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERNDISTRCT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
In Re Marie Robina Grayson, alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS. ) No.2780. Praecipe.
To the Clerk of the above entitled Court: You will please send up the following portions of the record in the above-entitled cause to the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit:
Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus
Return to Writ and Exhibit "A" of Return
Order that Writ of Habeas Corpus issue
Stipulation extending time of appeal filed Aug.7,1914. order extendding time of appeal
Order allowing Bill of Exceptions Petitioner Bond on appeal x
The following portions of exhibit No.1:
4 Evidence taken at Everett, Wash. Jan.23, 1914.
5 Evidence taken at Everett, Wash. Feb. 6, 1914, and the summary
9 Letter dated May 29, 1914, to Shakespeare from Turner
The following portions of exhibit No.2:
10 Letter dated April 16, 1912 to Hartman and Thompson signed J.L. Barbour
11 Letter dated April 9, 1913, from Ben J. Cable Acting Secretary
18 Transcript of testimony taken in longhand Feb. 5,1912.
div1.ab:
Clay Allen
U. S. Attorney G. P. Dishbourne
div1.p: We waive the provisions of the Act approved February 13, 1911, and direct that you forward typewritten transcripts to the Circuit Court of Appeals for printing as provided under Rule 105 of this Court.
div1.ab:
G. P. Dishbourne
Assistant U. S. Attorney.
div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON
In re Marie Robina Grayson, alias Marie Robina, for WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS
FILED IN THE U. S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION SEP 8-1914
div1.ab:
FRANK L. CROSBY,
Clerk By S. E. Leitch
Deputy
